definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[כַּאֲשֶׁר]] conj. according as, as, when (cf. for the combin. Aram. [[כְּדִי]], [[כַּד]])—
according to that which, according as, as:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Ge 34:12 I will give [[כאשׁר תאמרו אלי]] according as ye shall (or may) say unto me, Ge 44:1, Ex 8:23, Nu 22:8, 1Sa 2:16; Ge 34:22 if we are circumcised [[כאשׁר הם נמולים]]; Ge 41:21 [[כאשׁר בתחלה]] as at the beginning, so ´[[כ]] [[בראשׁונה]] Jos 8:5, Jos 8:6, 2Sa 7:10; Ex 5:13 [[כאשׁר בהיות התבן]]: Ge 7:9 they came in two by two [[כאשׁר חוה אלהִים]], as God commanded Noah; so, or similarly, very oft., esp. in P, v:Ge 7:16, Ge 8:21, Ge 12:4, Ge 17:23, Ge 21:1, Ge 21:1, Ex 16:24, Ex 39:1, Ex 39:5, Ex 39:7 Nu 3:16, Nu 3:42 etc.; ´[[כאשׁר דבר י]] De 1:21, De 2:1, De 6:3, De 6:19 + oft. Dt.

definitions.title: 2 d
definitions.body: ), Ge 50:12 [[ויעשׂו כן כאשׁר חִוׇּם]], Ex 7:10, Ex 7:20; Ge 18:5 (J) [[כן חעשׂח כאשׁר דברת]], Ex 10:10 (iron.), Am 5:14 (do.); in opp. order, Ju Jdg 1:7 [[כאשׁר עשׂיתי]], [[כן שׁלם לי]], Ex 7:6 [[כן עשׂו]] ´[[כאשׁר חוה י]], cf. Ex 12:28, Ex 12:50, Ex 39:43, Nu 5:4, Nu 17:26, Nu 36:10 (all P); with impf. (freq.) Nu 2:17 (P) [[כאשׁר יחנו כן יסעו]]; of degree = the more… the more, Ex 1:12 [[וכאשׁר יענּו אתו כן ירבה]] [[וכן יפרץ]], cf. Ex 17:11 (JE) ´[[וגבר ישׁר]]…[[והיה כאשׁר ירים]] according as he held up, etc., Israel prevailed; in an oath or solemn promise, Nu 14:28 [[אם לא]] [[כאשׁר דברתם כן אעשׂה]], De 28:63 (Je 31:28), 1Ki 1:30, Is 10:11, Is 14:24, Is 52:14 f. (v. [[כֵּן]]

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: oft. in similes (sq. impf. of habit) Ex 33:11 [[כאשׁר ידבר אישׁ אל]] [[רעהו]], Nu 11:12, De 1:44, Is 9:2, Is 66:20 +, answered by [[כֵּן]] Is 31:4, Is 55:10, Is 66:22, Am 3:12 +; a second verb is, in such cases, in the pf. with [[וְ]] consec. (Dr:§ 115) De 22:26, Is 29:8 [[והקיץ]]…[[כאשׁר יחלם]], Is 65:8, Am 5:19.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[הָיׇה כַּאֲשֶׁר]] (cf. [[הָיׇה כְּ]]) to be as if, Job 10:19 [[כאשׁר]] [[לא הייתי אהיה]], Zec 10:6 [[והיו כאשׁר לא זנחתים]].

with a casual force, in so far as, since (Germ. demgemäss dass), Ge 26:29 if thou doest us no harm [[כאשׁר לא נגענוך]] according as, in so far as, we have not touched thee; Nu 27:14 [[כאשׁר מריתם]] [[פי]] inasmuch as ye have defied my mouth, Ju Jdg 6:27, 1Sa 28:18 (answered by [[על כן]]), 2Ki 17:26, Mic 3:4.

with a temporal force, when, Ge 18:33 and Y. went away [[כאשׁר כלה]] when he had finished, etc., Ge 32:3, Ge 32:32, 1Sa 8:6, 2Sa 12:21 +; answered by [[וַּ]] (Dr:§ 127 b), 1 S 1Sa 6:6, 1Sa 12:8; …[[ויהי כאשׁר]] and it came to pass, when…Ge 12:11, Ge 20:13, Ge 24:22, Ge 24:52, Ex 32:19 + oft.; Ge 43:14 [[כאשׁר שׁכלתי שׁכלתי]] when I am bereaved, I am bereaved ! an expression of resignation, so Es 4:16 [[כאשׁר אבדתי אבדתי]]. Jos 2:7 [[אחרי כאשׁר]] is a ‘conflate’ reading, omit either [[אחרי]] or [[כ]]. Of future time, Ge 27:40, Ge 40:14 [[כאשׁר ייטב לך]], Ho 7:12, Ec 4:17, Ec 5:3, and without a verb Is 23:5 [[כאשׁר]] [[שׁמע למחרים]].—Mic 3:3 [[כאשׁר]] is simply as that which, Job 29:25 as one who.
